sense.def:
Kadar je človekovo vedenje
natural
, se vede tako, kot se ljudje navadno vedejo.

seg.quote: She's upset. It's natural, isn't it? Today's the funeral.
It is natural for trade unions to adopt an aggressive posture.

sense.def:
Za človekovo vedenje rečemo, da je
natural
tudi takrat, ko ne poskuša ničesar prikriti.

seg.quote: There was something not quite natural about her behaviour.
I was impressed by their ease and naturalness.

sense.def:
S sposobnostjo, ki je
natural
, se je človek že rodil.

seg.quote: He had a natural gift for making things work.
He is a great craftsman, a natural.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
natural
opisujemo stvari, ki obstajajo v naravi in jih ni povzročil človek.

seg.quote: ...protection from natural disasters such as earthquakes.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
dies of natural causes
, umre zaradi bolezni in ne zato, ker bi naredil samomor ali ker bi ga kdo ubil.

seg.quote: The post-mortem showed that death was due to natural causes.

sense.def:
One's natural mother or father
je resnična mati ali resnični oče v nasprotju s krušnimi starši.

seg.quote: She claimed Prince Yousoupoff as her natural father.

sense.def:
Nota, ki je
natural
, ni niti zvišana niti znižana.
